content: row using cc and continue using mc for row 2 next row knit all stitches knit yarn-overs knit/brk row together with the stitch they hug 90 stitches continue in two-color brioche rib until work measures 6 5 inches from cast-on edge ending beginning with a purl row work three rounds in with a row 1 cc purl/brp row garter stitch ie 1 row purl 1 row knit 1 row purl syncopation knit/brk row will now be in cc and purl/brp row in mc using elizabeth zimmerman s stretchy sewn bind-off bind off all stitches continue in two-color brioche but working row 2 knit/brk in cc** and row 1 purl/brp in mc finishing until cowl measures 8 5 ending with a row 2 in cc weave in ends and block lightly **note this results in working two row in cc before resuming alternating colors each row extra resources nancy marchant s website http //www briochestitch com/ v 1 1 © 2017 marlene berghout for personal non-commercial use only all rights reserved marleneberghout@gmail com �2 of �2
